package org.eclipse.birt.build;

import java.util.ArrayList;

import org.apache.tools.ant.types.DataType;

/**
 * Represent a project list
 *
 */
<fim_suffix>public class ProjectList extends DataType implements Cloneable
{
    protected ArrayList list = new ArrayList();
    
 
    /**
     * add a project
     * @param pro
     */
    public void addProjectInfo(ProjectInfo pro)
    {
        list.add(pro);
    }
    
    /**
     * get project by index
     * @param index
     * @return
     */
    public ProjectInfo getProject(int index)
    {
        assert(index>=0 && index<list.size());
        return (ProjectInfo)list.get(index);
    }
    
    
    /**
     * get count
     * @return
     */
    public int getCount()
    {
        return list.size();
    }
    

    
}<fim_middle>// class below has no smell
